entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 late this evening then diminishing to 20 before morning. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
